SELECT *
FROM receivingInspection ri
INNER JOIN progressInspection pi ON ri.pi_id = pi.pi_id INNER JOIN staff st ON pi.st_id = st.st_id INNER JOIN shippingStatus ss ON pi.ss_id = ss.ss_id INNER JOIN purchaseOrder po ON ss.po_id = po.po_id INNER JOIN procurementPlanRegistration ppr ON po.ppr_id = ppr.ppr_id INNER JOIN contract co ON ppr.co_id = co.co_id INNER JOIN estimate es ON co.es_id = es.es_id INNER JOIN product pr ON es.pr_id = pr.pr_id
WHERE pi.pi_status = "검수완료";
